title: Manhunt intensifies for person of interest in the murder of Yale student l GMA
author: Good Morning America
comment: Yale student and he was engaged...he had his whole life ahead of him.
You can sense the mother’s pain when she said that he was her only child. How devastating that must be... What a sad story... Ugh
Imagine having one child and it is no longer here. I would be devastated, this is so sad. Rip 🪦

This is the second video I've watched about this and I still get a weird feeling from the fiancee. Her acceptance of the engagement just seemed so odd and both times I've heard her speak of him seem so detached, like she's talking about a classmate and not her fiancee.
The killer was enrolled at MIT and the victim's fiance' had just graduated from MIT. I sense jealousy.
description:
U.S. Marshals are offering a $10,000 reward for information leading to MIT student Qixuan Pan, 29, who they believe is armed and dangerous and could be involved in the death of Kevin Jiang, 26.
READ MORE
